Name: Absinthe Gimlet
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A herbal riff on the classic gin-based Gimlet .
History: Adapted from a recipe created circa 2015 by Tara Garnell at The Cabinet Room in London, England after making Charles Vexenat 's Green Beast .
Nutrition: One serving of Absinthe Gimlet contains 122 calories
